thread.title: 15% Off Per Day, Plus Free Use of Car at Suite Novotel
thread.title_full: 15% Off Per Day, Plus Free Use of Car at Suite Novotel

title: 15% Off Per Day, Plus Free Use of Car at Suite Novotel
text:
Home > Hotel Deals > 15% Off Per Day, Plus Free Use of Car at Suite Novotel 15% Off Per Day, Plus Free Use of Car at Suite Novotel by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - September 10, 2015 at 7:26 PM Tweet 
Suite Novotel offers perks for select stays of three or more nights. When you stay three nights or more at Suite Novotel, you receive personalized services, such as a complimentary massage every Thursday evening and a free, unlimited "suite box" that consists of Internet access, music and films on demand, and national telephone service. From the fourth consecutive night on, you'll also get a vehicle at your disposal free of charge at select hotels. The longer you stay, the lower the price of your night's accommodation. You can save up to 15 percent off per day! 
Some popular Suite Novotels include: Suite Novotel Paris Roissy CDG Suite Novotel Hamburg City Suite Novotel Wien Messe (Vienna) Suite Novotel Munchen Parkstadt Schwabing (Munich) 
How to get this deal: For more information or to book, visit the Deals for Three Nights and More on the Suite Novotel website. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
